general.gigTitle: design and develop responsive wordpress website, wordpress blog

sellerCard.description: Hi, I am Imtiaz Ahmad. An expert WordPress Designer/Developer. For the last three years I have worked with clients from all over the world and have created almost any type of website. Now ready to provide my excellent services here on Fiverr.

description.content:
With a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and over 6 Years of Experience in WordPress Design and Development, I can design and develop a fully responsive wordpress website for you using, the most popular WordPress page builders. I have been designing and developing professional WordPress websites for clients from all over the world.


What you Get!

 

  • Clean and Responsive Designs
  •  Fast and SEO Friendly 
  • Easy Content Management
  • Fully Wordpress Customization
  • Live Chat Integration
  •  Social Media Integration
  •  Integration of mailing services
  •  Google Map and Contact Forms Integrations 
  • Blog Setup
  •  Super Fast Loading
  •  E-commerce Functionality
  • Perfect Call to Action for the best Conversation 
  • Easy to Maintenance for new users


If you are not sure about my packages, or if you have any specific requirements, simply send a message, and we can discuss your requirements and functionalities in Detail.



Place your order and get your clean, high-quality, responsive website today

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I Contact you Before Placing an Order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, Please Message me Before placing an Order, So we can discuss your Requirements more Closely.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What Things Before I need to Get Started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need Your Domain and Hosting Logins, Your Website Contents, Number of Pages that you need, For example, HOME | ABOUT | SERVICES | CONTACT US If you have any Design or any Reference sites that you like, please let us know, So I can Clear everything for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you Provide Website Maintenance Service ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes I Do! Will charge for these services, Please Message me, So we can Discuss everything

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you Use WORDPRESS for Developing Website?

Installation of Wordpress, Social Media Integration, 
3 Pages

packageList.description: Wordpress Setup, Social Media Integration, 6 Pages with Blog

packageList.title: Premium
packageList.description: Wordpress Setup, Social Media Integration, 10 Pages with Blog, E-Commerce Store up-to 5 Products.

milestones.title: Requirements
milestones.description: We'll make sure I have everything needed to complete your project.

milestones.title: Video meetup
milestones.description: We'll meet (Zoom) to discuss your project.

reviews.comment: Extremely patient despite having to explain a lot of background technical stuff. Never made to feel stupid and put under pressure. Always responded promptly. Found the Zoom calls very helpful for talking through things and screen sharing. Really recommend. Thanks!

Imtiaz truly SHINES in website development! His attention to detail and code expertise are top-notch, making the project a breeze to work on. What a PRO—his proactive communication and professionalism exceeded my expectations, and I can't wait to use his services again! 👍

Imtiaz truly shines in website development! The documentation provided was impeccable, and his attention to details absolutely exceeded expectations. It's a pleasure working with someone so fluent, polite, and QUICK to respond. Highly recommend! 🌟🙌

Imtiaz did an EXCEPTIONAL job with the website development—his attention to detail and bug-free, professional work truly stood out! Working with him was a breeze thanks to his quick responses, clear communication, and great cooperation. Highly recommend him! 🙌
